{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Secretary",
  "description": "Global Oneword Limited is an indigenous Pharmaceutical Company established in June 2012. Active marketing of products started in June 2013.

Global Oneword Limited specializes in importing, marketing, selling and distributing ONCOLOGY drugs, OTC prescription drugs, as well as other things that relate to health care and health services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Secretary

Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking an organized and proactive Administrative Secretary to support the smooth day-to-day running of our office.
	The successful candidate will provide administrative and clerical support, ensuring efficiency, professionalism, and excellent communication at all times.


Key Responsibilities


	Supporting management and team members with administrative tasks.
	Managing phone calls, emails, and correspondence.
	Preparing documents, reports, and presentations.
	Maintaining filing systems (digital and physical).
	Create basic content for business promotion.


Requirements


	HND or B.Sc qualification in any related field.
	Proven experience in an administrative or secretarial role.
	Strong organizational and time-management skills
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook, and Graphic Designing)
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Professional attitude with strong attention to detail
	Must reside within the Surulere, Coker-Orile, Amuwo Odofin, Mile 2, Okota, Isolo axis.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified&nbsp;candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@globaloneword.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Administrative Secretary Job at Global Oneword Limited




        
    

        
        Global Oneword Limited is an indigenous Pharmaceutical Company established in June 2012. Active marketing of products started in June 2013.

Global Oneword Limited specializes in importing, marketing, selling and distributing ONCOLOGY drugs, OTC prescription drugs, as well as other things that relate to health care and health services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Secretary

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking an organized and proactive Administrative Secretary to support the smooth day-to-day running of our office.
	The successful candidate will provide administrative and clerical support, ensuring efficiency, professionalism, and excellent communication at all times.


Key Responsibilities


	Supporting management and team members with administrative tasks.
	Managing phone calls, emails, and correspondence.
	Preparing documents, reports, and presentations.
	Maintaining filing systems (digital and physical).
	Create basic content for business promotion.


Requirements


	HND or B.Sc qualification in any related field.
	Proven experience in an administrative or secretarial role.
	Strong organizational and time-management skills
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook, and Graphic Designing)
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Professional attitude with strong attention to detail
	Must reside within the Surulere, Coker-Orile, Amuwo Odofin, Mile 2, Okota, Isolo axis.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@globaloneword.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Junior Accountant",
  "description": "HR-Aid Consults - Our client, an Invoicing Solutions Company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Accountant

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid

Job Summary


	Our client&nbsp;is seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Accountant to support the company&rsquo;s financial operations.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for maintaining accurate financial records, supporting budgeting and reporting processes, and ensuring compliance with accounting standards and company policies.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and maintain accurate financial records, ledgers, and documentation.
	Record daily financial transactions and ensure proper reconciliation of accounts.
	Assist in the preparation of monthly management accounts and financial reports.
	Monitor expenses, invoices, and payments to ensure accuracy and timeliness.
	Support payroll processing and statutory deductions where applicable.
	Assist with budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning activities.
	Ensure compliance with tax regulations and statutory filings (e.g., PAYE, VAT, WHT).
	Support internal and external audits by providing required documentation.
	Maintain proper filing and documentation of financial records.
	Collaborate with other departments to resolve financial discrepancies.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	Minimum of 1 year of relevant accounting or finance experience.
	Basic knowledge of Nigerian tax regulations and accounting standards.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and accounting software.
	Strong numerical, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
	High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
	Good communication and organizational skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a hybrid work environment.


Salary
N180,000 monthly

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;talent@hr-aidconsults.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-02-25",

Junior Accountant Job at HR-Aid Consults




        
    

        
        HR-Aid Consults - Our client, an Invoicing Solutions Company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Accountant

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid

Job Summary


	Our client is seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Accountant to support the company’s financial operations.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for maintaining accurate financial records, supporting budgeting and reporting processes, and ensuring compliance with accounting standards and company policies.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Prepare and maintain accurate financial records, ledgers, and documentation.
	Record daily financial transactions and ensure proper reconciliation of accounts.
	Assist in the preparation of monthly management accounts and financial reports.
	Monitor expenses, invoices, and payments to ensure accuracy and timeliness.
	Support payroll processing and statutory deductions where applicable.
	Assist with budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning activities.
	Ensure compliance with tax regulations and statutory filings (e.g., PAYE, VAT, WHT).
	Support internal and external audits by providing required documentation.
	Maintain proper filing and documentation of financial records.
	Collaborate with other departments to resolve financial discrepancies.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	Minimum of 1 year of relevant accounting or finance experience.
	Basic knowledge of Nigerian tax regulations and accounting standards.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and accounting software.
	Strong numerical, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
	High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
	Good communication and organizational skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a hybrid work environment.


Salary
N180,000 monthly

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: talent@hr-aidconsults.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Assistant",
  "description": "Global Oneword Healthcare Limited is a pharmaceutical company specialized in importation and distribution of medicines.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant
Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a smart, reliable, and proactive Administrative Assistant to support daily office operations, handle administrative tasks, assist with content creation and advertising, and support logistics-related activities.


Key Responsibilities


	Handle general administrative and office support duties.
	Support advertising and promotional activities (online and offline)
	Create basic content for business promotion.
	Manage records, documents, and basic reporting
	Provide support for daily operational tasks as assigned


Requirements


	HND or B.Sc qualification in any related field
	Experience in a logistics company or shipment booking is an added advantage
	Must be computer literate (Microsoft Office, internet tools, basic content creation, graphic designing, powerpoint)
	Good knowledge of advertising and promotions
	Must reside within the Surulere, Amuwo Odofin, Mile 2, Coker Orile axis
	Presentable, hardworking, loyal, and respectful
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong organizational and time-management skills
	Ability to work with minimal supervision.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;bejitu@yahoo.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the Subject of the email.",

Administrative Assistant Job at Global Oneword Healthcare Limited




        
    

        
        Global Oneword Healthcare Limited is a pharmaceutical company specialized in importation and distribution of medicines.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant
Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a smart, reliable, and proactive Administrative Assistant to support daily office operations, handle administrative tasks, assist with content creation and advertising, and support logistics-related activities.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Handle general administrative and office support duties.
	Support advertising and promotional activities (online and offline)
	Create basic content for business promotion.
	Manage records, documents, and basic reporting
	Provide support for daily operational tasks as assigned


Requirements


	HND or B.Sc qualification in any related field
	Experience in a logistics company or shipment booking is an added advantage
	Must be computer literate (Microsoft Office, internet tools, basic content creation, graphic designing, powerpoint)
	Good knowledge of advertising and promotions
	Must reside within the Surulere, Amuwo Odofin, Mile 2, Coker Orile axis
	Presentable, hardworking, loyal, and respectful
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong organizational and time-management skills
	Ability to work with minimal supervision.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: bejitu@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the Subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Marketing & Sales Personnel",
  "description": "Doheney Services Limited helps businesses work more efficiently and effectively by providing tech, admin, and structured staff, all within the budget provided. The company has been working with businesses in Nigeria, the UK, and some other parts of the world, to help them do better work for less money. Doheney services can take over tedious tasks like hiring new suitable employees, project management, or even creating reward systems.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing &amp; Sales Personnel
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Contract
Industry: Event Management App (Growth &amp; User Onboarding)

Role Overview


	The role is responsible for promoting our event management app, increasing awareness, driving user onboarding, and growing active usage through field marketing, digital channels, and direct outreach.


Key Responsibilities


	Promote the app through online and offline channels
	Onboard new users on the application
	Build partnerships with event planners and organisations
	Gather user feedback and market insights
	Attend events hosted on the app for publicity and coverage


Required Qualifications &amp; Skills
Required:


	2 years of experience in marketing, sales, or business development
	Strong communication and persuasion skills
	Ability to work independently and meet targets


Nice-to-have:


	Experience in the events or hospitality industry
	Experience in content making.


Personality &amp; Fit:


	Self-motivated and results-driven
	Confident interacting with clients
	Creative and proactive
	Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment.


Salary


	N150,000 per month.


Career Progression:


	This role offers a contract-to-hire pathway based on performance, professionalism, and alignment with company goals.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to:&nbsp;eosanyintuyi@doheneyservices.com&nbsp;using &quot;Sales Executive&quot; as the subject of the mail.",

Marketing & Sales Personnel Job at Doheney Services Limited




        
    

        
        Doheney Services Limited helps businesses work more efficiently and effectively by providing tech, admin, and structured staff, all within the budget provided. The company has been working with businesses in Nigeria, the UK, and some other parts of the world, to help them do better work for less money. Doheney services can take over tedious tasks like hiring new suitable employees, project management, or even creating reward systems.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing & Sales Personnel
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Contract
Industry: Event Management App (Growth & User Onboarding)

Role Overview
     

            
    




	The role is responsible for promoting our event management app, increasing awareness, driving user onboarding, and growing active usage through field marketing, digital channels, and direct outreach.


Key Responsibilities


	Promote the app through online and offline channels
	Onboard new users on the application
	Build partnerships with event planners and organisations
	Gather user feedback and market insights
	Attend events hosted on the app for publicity and coverage


Required Qualifications & Skills
Required:


	2 years of experience in marketing, sales, or business development
	Strong communication and persuasion skills
	Ability to work independently and meet targets


Nice-to-have:


	Experience in the events or hospitality industry
	Experience in content making.


Personality & Fit:


	Self-motivated and results-driven
	Confident interacting with clients
	Creative and proactive
	Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment.


Salary


	N150,000 per month.


Career Progression:


	This role offers a contract-to-hire pathway based on performance, professionalism, and alignment with company goals.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to: eosanyintuyi@doheneyservices.com using "Sales Executive" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Sales Executive",
  "description": "Doheney Services Limited helps businesses work more efficiently and effectively by providing tech, admin, and structured staff, all within the budget provided. The company has been working with businesses in Nigeria, the UK, and some other parts of the world, to help them do better work for less money. Doheney services can take over tedious tasks like hiring new suitable employees, project management, or even creating reward systems.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief


	The Sales Executive is responsible for promoting and selling the company&rsquo;s mechanical and electrical products, accessories, and solutions to clients in the building and construction industry.
	The role focuses on developing new client relationships, managing existing clients, and achieving sales targets.


Key Responsibilities
Sales &amp; Business Development:


	Identify and develop sales opportunities for mechanical and electrical products, accessories, and building solutions.
	Promote company products and services to contractors, architects, interior designers, and other key stakeholders in the building industry.
	Achieve assigned sales targets and contribute to overall revenue growth.


Client Relationship Management:


	Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, including contractors, architects, and interior designers.
	Follow up on leads, inquiries, and client requests in a timely and professional manner.
	Maintain client records, track sales activity, and report progress to supervisors.


Market Intelligence &amp; Networking:


	Develop and leverage a network of contacts within the building industry to generate sales opportunities.
	Keep abreast of market trends, competitor products, and client preferences.
	Attend industry events, exhibitions, and client meetings to strengthen relationships and promote company products.


Coordination &amp; Reporting:


	Work closely with internal teams, including marketing, logistics, and commercial, to ensure smooth execution of sales orders.
	Prepare basic sales reports and updates on client interactions and opportunities.


Requisite Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree or Diploma in any relevant field; a background in sales, marketing, or business is an advantage.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in sales of building materials, home furnishings, or mechanical/electrical products to the building or construction industry.
	Familiarity with the building industry, contractors, interior designers, architects, or related networks is an advantage.
	Proven track record in client acquisition, relationship management, and achieving sales targets.


Skills &amp; Competencies:


	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and negotiation skills.
	Client-focused, target-driven, and self-motivated.
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple clients simultaneously.
	Good organisational and reporting skills.
	Basic proficiency in Microsoft Office applications.


Salary
N300,000 - N350,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to:&nbsp;eosanyintuyi@doheneyservices.com&nbsp;using &quot;Sales Executive&quot; as the subject of the mail.",
